attributes.action: Request that Brent Council change the current parking times outside Sudbury Primary School on the Watford Road, HA0 3EY to 10am until 2.45pm. Allowing parents to park legally when collecting their children from school at 3pm.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sudbury Primary school used to finish each day at 3.30pm , but now finishes at 3pm.
It is not permitted to park outside until 3pm.
We would like to change the parking restriction by only 15 minutes which would allow enough time for parents to find parking and collect their children.
